name: My Mushroom Mutates
description:
The difference between planting mushroom and cultivating mushroom is that the meticulously cultivated mushroom can walk~

Here is the story...
The little mushroom has produced eyes and mouth under the influence of quantum mind magnetic field.
"How will the dust stay on completely nothing physical", so how will the little mushroom live on with so much dust?
And, which level can you cultivate your little mushroom to?
